description:
NEPAL AND THE WORLD ECONOMY:
INVESTING IN SUSTAINED ENGAGEMENT

subproject.corporate outcome: Policies, strategies and partnerships established to enhance public-private sector collaboration and private sector and market development that benefit the poor and ensure that low-income households and small enterprises have access to a broad range of financial and legal services
subproject.description: Conduct feasibility studies for three alternative transit routes  and a diagnostic study on service trade; develop and disseminate trade, investment and export promotional materials/policies; organize training and sensitization programmes on trade and WTO issues; support ministry of industry, commerce and supplies  in its negotiation for a FTA and its effort to enhance capacity to access information resources associated with WTO; and provide training and sensitization programmes to SMEs on WTO issues including market intelligence in sectors of export interest; preparation of trade integration strategy
subproject.title: Policies & initiatiatives EMPL

title: NEP/05/006 - ENHANCING NEPAL'S TRADE RELATED CAPACITY
